means: 发出嗡嗡声，哼唱( hum的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The guard stopped his humming and turned his head sharply.
sentence.Network_cn: 守卫停止了哼唱，猛地转过头。

sentence.Network_en: There was a low humming sound in the sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 空中传来一阵低沉的嗡嗡声。

sentence.Network_en: Within five hours, the equipment will be humming away again.
sentence.Network_cn: 用不了5小时，设备就又能嗡嗡地运转了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 发出嗡嗡声（Humming）。发出嗡嗡声（Humming）可以在任何时间做。

音量最大时最大失真度 12、调制交流声(MODULATION HUM)、RANDOM NOISE(随机噪声) 条件:电平60dB,频率1KHZ,频偏75KHZ,音量最大,高频信号发生器频率打到98KHZ.
① 淡积云（Cu hum）：扁平的积云，垂直发展不盛，水平宽度大于垂直厚度。在阳光下呈白色，厚的云块中部有淡影，晴天常见。

encyclopedia.content: 基本资料 ◎译 名 哼唱/他遇见爱 ◎片 名 Humming ◎年 代 2008 ◎国 家 韩国 ◎类 别 爱情/剧情 ◎语 言 韩语 ◎字 幕 韩文/英文 ◎IMDB评分 N/A ◎IMDB链接 N/A ◎文件格式 XviD + MP3 ◎视频尺寸 640 x 352 ◎文件大小 1CD 50 x 15MB ◎片 长 96 mins ◎导 演 朴大永 Dae-yeong Park ◎主 演 李天熙 Cheon-hee Lee 韩智慧 Ji-hye Han 李民基 Min-kil lee简 介 美妍（韩智慧饰）和俊树（李天熙饰）的爱情是与这个时代的许多年轻

entry.tran: 发出连续而低沉的声音;发嗡嗡声
entry.def: If something hums, it makes a low continuous noise.

example.ex: The birds sang, the bees hummed...
Within five hours, the equipment will be humming away again...
example.tran: 用不了5小时，设备就又能嗡嗡地运转了。

entry.def: When you hum a tune, you sing it with your lips closed.

example.ex: She was humming a merry little tune...
example.tran: 她哼着一支欢快的小曲儿。

example.ex: He hummed to himself as he opened the trunk.
example.tran: 他独自哼着曲子打开了车子的后备箱。

entry.def: If you say that a place hums, you mean that it is full of activity.

example.ex: The place is really beginning to hum...
example.tran: 这个地方真正开始热闹起来了。

example.ex: On Saturday morning, the town hums with activity and life.
example.tran: 周六早晨，小镇一派热闹繁忙，活力盎然。

entry.def: Hum is sometimes used to represent the sound people make when they are not sure what to say.

example.ex: Hum, I am sorry but I thought you were French.
example.tran: 嗯，很抱歉，我以为你是法国人。

means.word_mean: 2. the act of singing with closed lips
